title: Is an iPad useful for architecture students or a laptop? - Quora

response.answer_text: to certain extent yes it is useful but I reccomend u to use a laptop due to following reasons : 1 . it allows to use many architecture apps like sketchup,AutoCad,rhinoetc.(even in ipad it allows but according to surveys it performs better in macos and windows 10 then ipad os ) 2. it has expandable storage to ur wish and can add external storage whereas in ipad only a fixed storage and expandable storage to 1tb only . 3. a laptop has more functions relating to software on keyboard than an ipad with a keyboard . u may prefer ipad for apple pencil and smooth software ,which is good but u can also buy a touch screen laptop with a stylus which is even better believe me I have tested many laptops and am telling u .
